page.title: 08TRAFFIC CENSUS.
page.content: A group of fourth years took a traffic census of vehicles passing the Cromer Road Recreation Ground between 14.45 and 15.15 on six Tuesdays during the Summer Term. The results were: TRAFFIC 23/4 30/4 07/5 04/6 11/6 09/7 {Cars 205 224 220 217 310 288 {Caravans 1 1 1 0 0 1 {Vans 10 12 11 10 18 11 {M/Cycles 4 4 3 3 7 10 {Coaches 5 8 4 3 3 2 {Buses 0 0 0 0 4 2 {Minibuses 0 0 1 0 0 2 {Taxis 4 7 6 3 4 6 {Lorries 3 5 2 1 0 0 {Business 23 31 26 19 17 20 {Emergency 1 5 1 1 1 0 {Bicycles 10 25 4 7 5 6 {TOTALS 266 322 279 264 369 348 It is quite a busy road and we think there should be a pelican crossing for people going to the Health Centre.
